interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Facial Kit For Women - Includes Facial Mask, Facial Makeup Wipes, Nose Strips, Facial Cleansers, Facial- Self Care Package For Women (Multivitamin Facial Kit)
Review Date: 2020/09/26
Store: Golden Gift Box
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Golden Gift Box', 'Item Form': 'Wipes', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 9 x 3 inches; 2.47 Pounds', 'UPC': '758176585684'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:f054bc1ef56dd4b625a57cf8672d7c56]] This has EVERYTHING I need to clean up in the evening or have a spa day at home. Plenty of face masks, plenty of eye masks and it even comes with a cute lip collagen mask. The face scrubber is soft and I love freezing the eye mask and wearing it in the tub. You can wear it warm or cold. The whole kit would be great for a birthday gift or wedding shower gift since it is neatly packaged.
Review Title: Spa Day!!!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bath Bombs, SAZEN Bath Bomb with Natural & Organic Essential Oils, Shea Coconut Butter for Skin Moisturize, Bubble Spa Bath, Birthday Mothers Day Christmas Handmade Gift Set for Women Kids Her Him
SAZEN
{'Brand': 'SAZEN', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Organic Ingredients', 'Unit Count': '24.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '24', 'Package Dimensions': '12.17 x 6.26 x 2.24 inches; 2.65 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SAZEN 01', 'UPC': '745103723622', 'Manufacturer': 'SAZEN'}
[[VIDEOID:73b249dcdf678ad402a99764551a434d]] When you open the box, you see 18 magical pieces and think this is excellent. Unfortunately, they are super perfume scented, but the perfume goes away in just a moment of two in the bath. I used 2 in one bath and was disappointed that the scent didn't linger for much longer than it did. Especially since the description specifies that it would be great for sinuses! These are more for children who don't enjoy the spa setting as much and just want colorful tubs.
Not Much Scent...
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
The concept behind these hair ties  are great but they are itchy if you wear them on your wrist. As far as stretch goes though they do well for a couple of wears. I found them to be a lot looser after a week. Cute but not the best.
A Little Itchy
Maya Mari Hydrating Argan Oil Shampoo – Rich in Nutrients, Restores Moisture & Shine, 32 oz
MAYA MARI
{'Brand': 'MAYA MARI', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Curly Hair', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 10 inches; 1.94 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'MMAROILSP', 'UPC': '850004068267'}
I'm slightly indifferent to this shampoo. We use argan oil shampoo often but this one is hit or miss. It makes my hair more greasy than shiny while it works great for my husbands. It does lather pretty well and the bottle is large, but it just didn't cut it for mine. I have thick hair and what we thought was the extra shine left a layer of grease on my brush the next day. Not typical for my hair and my wash schedule.
Shine or Grease?

You can wear it warm or cold. The whole kit would be great for a birthday gift or wedding shower gift since it is neatly packaged.
Spa Day!!!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** Enjoys bath products, particularly bath bombs, and has expanded interest to hair accessories and facial care. Recently explored shampoo options with hydrating properties and is now interested in facial kits for home spa experiences. 
- **Scent Preference:** Prefers natural and organic scents for bath products, with disappointment in scent longevity. Scent preferences for hair care remain undefined, while facial care products are secondary to functionality.
- **Usage Intent:** Seeks products that provide a soothing or spa-like experience, including facial kits for relaxation. In hair products, emphasizes hydration and shine, while focusing on effective cleansing and skin care in facial products.
- **Quality Expectations:** Values high-quality, organic ingredients across all categories. This extends to hair accessories and facial products, prioritizing comfort, durability, and effectiveness.
- **Experience with Products:** Experiences mixed results among product categories, specifically critiquing bath products for scent longevity and recent hair care attempts for greasiness. Positive recent experiences include a comprehensive facial care kit ideal for at-home spa days.
- **Gift Consideration:** Considers bath products, hair accessories, and facial care kits as thoughtful gifts, especially those that align with quality standards and personal care efficacy.

The user maintains a discerning approach to personal care items, focusing on quality, performance, comfort, and suitability for both adults and children.
